attributes.action: Pay working parents funded childcare for children 3 years old and over 48 weeks of the year and not just school term times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned feel that the government would encourage people back to work and make working parents lives easier if funded nursery hours were given for more weeks of the year.
Working parents with children at nursery still have to pay nursery fees during school holidays and the present system only provides funding during term time.
Most nurseries give the child 4 weeks holiday so funded nursery should be paid 48weeks a year for those whose children attend nursery all year round.
